title: Who is leaving Emmerdale as Cain, Moira and Nate risk serious danger?
text:
Cain’s revenge plot ends up putting his own life at risk. (Picture: ITV)

A boat explosion puts the lives of Cain Dingle (Jeff Hordley), Moira Barton (Natalie J Robb) and Nate Robinson (Jurell Carter) at risk in Emmerdale tonight as the tension between the three characters after months of build-up comes to an almighty crescendo.

After Pete Barton (Anthony Quinlan) reveals to Cain that it was Nate having an affair with Moira, Cain’s plan for revenge quickly escalates while all three characters are on a fishing trip together.

In the midst of a physical battle between Nate and Cain, Moira is knocked into the water and, unable to free her leg from some rope, struggles in the water. However, Nate and Cain are also in jeopardy as a fire quickly spreads through the fishing boat leading to an explosion.

With three Emmerdale characters left for dead tonight, who (if anyone) will survive the horrific explosion?

Advertisement

Advertisement

Who is leaving Emmerdale?

After Cain took Pete hostage, thinking that he was having an affair with Moira, fans feared the worst for the former barman, especially as it has been confirmed that Anthony Quinlan will be leaving the soap at some stage.

However, it doesn’t seem to be Pete who gets the brunt of Cain’s rage tonight, with Moira and Nate’s lives now hanging in the balance following Cain’s revenge plot, which has also left a question mark as to whether Cain survives the explosion, too.

We don’t know at this stage if Moira, Nate and Cain survive the boat explosion and none of the actors have revealed if they will be leaving the soap or not.

However, one character we do know will be leaving the soap for sure is Faith Dingle, as actress Sally Dexter confirmed that her character will be ‘collateral’ in the fallout between Moira, Cain and Nate.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Sally exclusively told Metro.co.uk earlier this month: ‘Well, there’s a lot of fallout from the Moira, Cain, Nate debacle, I am probably going to be collateral. It’s going to be an explosive October.

Advertisement

Advertisement

If the door will be left open for Sally’s return is yet to be seen with the actress teasing: ‘I may have to leave for a little while.’

Sally will join fellow Emmerdale stars Sandra Marvin, Ryan Hawley, Michael Praed, Alan Convy, Thomas Atkinson, Mark Jordan, Jane Cox, Shila Iqbal and Louisa Clein who all exited the soap this year as well.

description: A boat explosion puts the lives of Cain, Moira and Nate at risk as the tension between the characters comes to a head in dramatic scenes.
